tests.message: The expression `not ( all_fail : leap_year ( 2015 ) )` was expected to return `true`, but it returned `false` instead
tests.name: year not divisible by 4 in common year
tests.test_code:
'1_year_not_divisible_by_4_in_common_year_test_'() ->
    {"year not divisible by 4 in common year",
     {16,
      fun() ->
             begin
                 fun() ->
                        X__T = is_process_alive(self()),
                        case not all_fail:leap_year(2015) of
                            X__T ->
                                ok;
                            X__V ->
                                error({assert,
                                       [{module, all_fail_tests},
                                        {line, 16},
                                        {expression,
                                         "not ( all_fail : leap_year ( "
                                         "2015 ) )"},
                                        {expected, true},
                                        case not X__T of
                                            X__V ->
                                                {value, false};
                                            _ ->
                                                {not_boolean, X__V}
                                        end]})
                        end
                 end()
             end
      end}}.
